item.title: Mapping Information Ecology: Understanding the Fragmentation of Disability Service Information
item.description: I am the co-author of the grant proposal, and participate in this project as a graduate research assistant under Dr. Myeong Lee’s supervision.

item.title: Exploring How Convergence Methods Foster Shared Accountability to Reveal, Map, and Mitigate the Sources and Dynamics of Bias across Social Service Provisioning Systems
item.description: I participate in this project as a graduate research assistant under Dr. Myeong Lee’s supervision.

item.title: AI for AI: Toward Community-level Human-AI Collaborations in Local Meetups
item.description: I participated in this project under Dr. Myeong Lee’s supervision. I generated various types of features from Meetup data and built ML models to predict group activity level and event participation.

item.title: Making Information Deserts Visible: Computational Models, Disparities in Civic Technology Use, and Urban Decision Making
item.description: I participated in this project under Dr. Myeong Lee’s supervision. I built ML models to identify government employees and led the web visualization development team.
